person.persName: Thomas M. Allen (Fleming County, KY, resident, Kenton Co farmer)

body.p: Fleming County, Kentucky, resident, and Kenton County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Francis W. Allen and Maria N. Allen. Student in Bath County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident of Fleming County in 1860. Farmer in Kenton County in 1863.
